items.summary: Set the appâ€™s default displayed name to "Hina Sadat" (instead of the current default "Ghazal") and ensure the editable name field is prefilled with "Hina Sadat" on first load.
Expand the rotating "No"-button dialogue list to include many more messages (significantly more than the current list) and continue cycling messages as the user repeatedly taps/clicks "No".
Change the "No" button behavior so it moves to a new position only when the user clicks/taps it, and it must not move on hover or mere touch/hover proximity.

Ensure the main interaction layout (name header, question, and Yes/No buttons) fits comfortably on phone-sized screens without horizontal overflow; adjust button sizing/stacking as needed for small viewports while preserving the existing visual style.
